name: Doppel Defender
description:
Doppel Defender is an action co-op tower defense game. You corporate with a shooter partner to clear out 5 waves of enemies who approaching the heart tower. Be careful, friendly fire is ON.

Mouse Control (Recommended)

  • Drag to Move
  • Hold left-mouse button to Shoot

Keyboard Control

  • A / Left-arrow key to Move left
  • D / Right-arrow key to Move right
  • Hold SPACEBAR to Shoot
